title: How do I manage the applications and widgets on home screens?
answer:
By pressing and holding an application or a widget, you can drag it onto another place, onto ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=110498) or ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=110499) to uninstall it or share it. 

 ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=110500)

 ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=110501)

 Key system applications cannot be deleted or shared.
